product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Lentils, Rice and Indian Spice - Single Serving
long_description: Get the taste of India on your next trip with this tasty entree from MaryJanesFarm. A vegan dish with all-natural, USDA Organic ingredients. Can be prepared in its own pouch; just add boiling water, stir and let stand before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Get the taste of India on your next trip with this tasty entree from MaryJanesFarm.
